Actions.Name: Long Range Beam
Actions.Effects: Electrifies characters. Ignores cover. Critically hits electrified characters (+[D]).

Actions.Name: Charge Boost
Actions.Description: The Warmech flies 4. When it lands, adjacent characters are shoved 1 and electrified. Electrified characters are teleported 1.

Actions.Name: Seekers
Actions.Description: All foes in range 4 take 2 piercing damage.

Actions.Name: Perimeter Beams
Actions.AreaEffect: Foes are shoved 2 and must save or become shattered.
Actions.Collide: Foe takes [fray] damage and fails the save.
